DOC.brief_summary: In order to assess the effectiveness of biomagnetic therapy (PST) in the treatment of gonarthrosis, we conducted a randomized, double blind controlled clinical trial comparing one group of patients treated with PST and a second group of patients treated with conventional physical therapy.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Biomagnetic Therapy on Gonarthrosis
DOC.criteria: at least 35 years old local symptoms over a period of at least oneyear persistent symptoms despite non steroidal antiinflammatory drugs informed consent operative treatment in the last six months intraarticular injection in the last four months rheumatic disease homolateral coxarthrosis malignant disorder body mass index greater than 33% pregnancy inability to understand the visual analog scale
